smart_contract:
from pyteal import *

def secure_group_contract():
    check_group_size = Global.group_size() == Int(6)

    
        txn_checks = [
        And(
            Gtxn[0].type_enum() == TxnType.ApplicationCall,
            Gtxn[0].application_args[0] == Bytes("create"),
            Gtxn[0].application_id() == Int(0),
            Gtxn[0].fee() <= Int(2000)
        ),
        And(
            Gtxn[1].type_enum() == TxnType.Payment,
            Gtxn[1].amount() >= Int(1000000),
            Gtxn[1].receiver() == Addr("G2DTT3C7ES2HPFY43FONCBLS55MEYN7JDUJMBUYXLZIR36JZODG7W4YHIA"),
            Gtxn[1].fee() <= Int(1000),
            Gtxn[1].rekey_to() == Global.zero_address()
        ),
        And(
            Gtxn[2].type_enum() == TxnType.AssetTransfer,
            Gtxn[2].asset_receiver() == Addr("I2NAJ3WHCC62CYEHJWI7PUDDXYLHPLR7BLU73OFMUFIB35QIGD3VOOKADM"),
            Gtxn[2].asset_amount() >= Int(200),
            Gtxn[2].fee() <= Int(1200),
            Gtxn[2].rekey_to() == Global.zero_address(),
            Gtxn[2].asset_close_to() == Global.zero_address()
        ),
        And(
            Gtxn[3].type_enum() == TxnType.ApplicationCall,
            Gtxn[3].application_args[0] == Bytes("finalize"),
            Gtxn[3].application_id() == Int(1),
            Gtxn[3].fee() <= Int(1000)
        ),
        And(
            Gtxn[4].type_enum() == TxnType.Payment,
            Gtxn[4].amount() >= Int(500000),
            Gtxn[4].receiver() == Addr("YVGA3LHHW46QTOAATHCRW56YCZ4O4H2R73J7XQQJF5WEC3V73B2GVYOQR4"),
            Gtxn[4].fee() <= Int(1500),
            Gtxn[4].close_remainder_to() == Global.zero_address(),
            Gtxn[4].rekey_to() == Global.zero_address()
        ),
        And(
            Gtxn[5].type_enum() == TxnType.AssetTransfer,
            Gtxn[5].asset_receiver() == Addr("QGXWHORVFSWNLRZFC26FKSSNUPOLGMVL2R7QWZIPSZFCWUYBX2KRBPNS3A"),
            Gtxn[5].asset_amount() >= Int(300),
            Gtxn[5].fee() <= Int(1100),
            Gtxn[5].rekey_to() == Global.zero_address(),
            Gtxn[5].asset_close_to() == Global.zero_address()
        )
    ]

    final_checks = And(
        check_group_size,
        *conditions,
        *txn_checks
    )

    return final_checks

if __name__ == '__main__':
    print(compileTeal(secure_group_contract(), mode=Mode.Signature, version=5))
